mapper.select: SELECT user_code, username, password, full_name FROM tbl_user WHERE username = #{ username }
SELECT (auto_increment - 1) AS 'cursor' FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'securitydb' AND table_name = 'tbl_user'

SELECT a.authority_code as code, a.authority_name as name, a.authority_desc as description FROM tbl_user_role ur JOIN tbl_authority a ON ur.authority_code = a.authority_code WHERE ur.user_code = #{ userCode }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_user ( username, password, full_name ) VALUES ( #{ username }, #{ password }, #{ fullName } )
